creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: circular ornament with relief designs; boat-like structure at top with canopy supported by five pillars; motifs below include birds, fish, snake-like creatures, foliate and floral motifs; wave-like pattern at bottom; attached ring at top
dimension: 4 1/16 x 3 1/2 x 1 in. (10.32 x 8.89 x 2.54 cm) (including ring)
title: Ornament, one of a pair
